content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    event_id,
    movie_id,
    event_type
    -- count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stdimentoringdatalakecm.dfs.core.windows.net/data/silver/events/year=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
-- group by event_id, movie_id, event_type
-- having count(*) > 2
where event_id = 3692540
    and movie_id = 'tt0000060'
